verses.verse: Paul, <S%G3972><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4610>Silvanus,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5095>Timothy,<s%> unto <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1577>church<s%> of the <S%G2331>Thessalonians<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> Christ: <S%G5547><s%>

We are <S%G3784>bound<s%> to <S%G2168>thank<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G4012>for<s%> <S%G5216>you,<s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> it <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G514>meet,<s%> because <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> groweth <S%G5232>exceedingly,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G26>charity<s%> of <S%G1538>every<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> each <S%G240>other<s%> <S%G4121>aboundeth;<s%>

Which is a manifest <S%G1730>token<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1342>righteous<s%> <S%G2920>judgment<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> that <S%G5209>ye<s%> may be counted <S%G2661>worthy<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> ye <S%G2532>also<s%> suffer: <S%G3958><s%>
Seeing <S%G1512><s%> it is a righteous <S%G1342>thing<s%> <S%G3844>with<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> to <S%G467>recompense<s%> <S%G2347>tribulation<s%> to them that <S%G2346>trouble<s%> <S%G5209>you;<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> who are <S%G2346>troubled<s%> <S%G425>rest<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G2257>us,<s%> <S%G1722>when<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> shall be <S%G602>revealed<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G1411>mighty<s%> <S%G32>angels,<s%>

In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G5395>flaming<s%> <S%G4442>fire<s%> <S%G1325>taking<s%> <S%G1557>vengeance<s%> on them that <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> that <S%G5219>obey<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> Christ: <S%G5547><s%>

Who <S%G3748><s%> shall be <S%G5099>punished<s%> <S%G1349><s%> with <S%G166>everlasting<s%> <S%G3639>destruction<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G4383>presence<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2479>power;<s%>

When <S%G3752><s%> he shall <S%G2064>come<s%> to be <S%G1740>glorified<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G40>saints,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to be <S%G2296>admired<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> them that <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G3754>(because<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3142>testimony<s%> <S%G1909>among<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> was <S%G4100>believed)<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G2250>day.<s%>

Wherefore <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> we <S%G4336>pray<s%> <S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G4012>for<s%> <S%G5216>you,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> would count you <S%G515>worthy<s%> <S%G5209><s%> of this <S%G2821>calling,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4137>fulfill<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the good <S%G2107>pleasure<s%> of his <S%G19>goodness,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2041>work<s%> of <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> power: <S%G1411><s%>

That <S%G3704><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> may be <S%G1740>glorified<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>
